snippet.title: Pre Civilization Egypt Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/461620

It’s a turn-based strategy built on the history of Ancient Egypt. In the game you will act as the right-hand man of the almighty Horus, ruler of Egypt in Predynastic period.

Starting from 5000 B.C. you will guide the Egyptians through all the hardships to prosperity and power. Get ready to march into faraway lands, fight catastrophes and hardships.
